activities: The following is a general description of how Mycroft, Inc. ("Mycroft"), uses personal information obtained from the EU and Switzerland ("Protected Information"): 1) Mycroft uses Protected Information pertaining to current and former personnel of Mycroft and its UK and Irish subsidiary ("Company") in connection with the management and operation of the Company, making services and benefits available to such personnel and maintaining contact with former personnel. 2) Mycroft uses Protected Information obtained from or relating to prospective or current clients of the Company and their personnel to provide and offer services to such clients and to fulfill its professional obligations pertaining to such services. 3) Mycroft may, from time to time, process Protected Information pertaining to members of the general public to respond to requests for information from such individuals (e.g., requests from individuals via our website). If a member of the general public makes an inquiry, we will use their Protected Information to provide them the information or communications they requested.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
